title: High Noon jhin and normal jhin
body: I'm not sure if it was intentional or not (i don't think it was) but i was playing jhin as the classic skin against the high noon jhin, and during the game i noticed i had his style of indicator for the W root effect instead of the classic white version.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We can take a look and see what's happening. My guess would be that a mirror match is causing this to occur, and it's a case of particle theft. D:
